name: Barold: Inferno
description:
- A Roguelike adventure.

As Barold, wake up in hell and face off against formidable foes like Slimes, Dragons, Cerberus, Balrogs, Hydras and more.
Progress through the circles of Inferno by upgrading your abilities, from passive auto shooters to intense sword fights - becoming a more formidable opponent with each circle.

But be cautious, as the demons and gods of hell will stop at nothing to entrap you in Inferno forever. Along the way, collect powerful elements that can combine into various items, each offering unique abilities, upgrades and attributes.
Meet a diverse cast of characters, each with their own stories.

GAMEPLAY

I Wake up in Inferno after your death in the mortal world.

II Find Elements and combine them into powerful weapons, abilities and summons.


III Explore the dungeons and find bosses.

IV Defeat the bosses and collect their Elements and Coins.


V Use the same Elements to upgrade your already existing abilities.

VI Try to get to the Ninth Circle of Inferno.

VII Use the Coins from the previous run to upgrade your next attempt!
